meta.title: About - Eye On Idea
meta.description: Meet Eye On Idea, a Denmark-based consultancy founded by Rune M. P. Pjetursson. We help B2B companies present themselves clearly online across Europe.

hero.title: Websites Built to Last
hero.subtitle: Eye On Idea helps B2B companies build a clear, professional online presence.

story.title: From Idea to Reality
paragraphs: Eye On Idea was founded in 2024 with a simple belief. Every business deserves a website that clearly shows who they are and what they offer.
Many companies end up with sites that do not fit their business. They are hard to update and costly to maintain over time.
We start by understanding your goals and your situation. Then we build a website you can rely on as you grow.

founder.name: Rune M. P. Pjetursson
bio: Rune founded Eye On Idea to turn complex needs into simple, reliable websites. His focus is results, clarity, and long-term value.
He has worked with companies across Europe. He helps teams make practical choices that support the business.

philosophy.title: Working Philosophy
philosophy.text: I prefer long-term partnerships over one-off projects. When you work with Eye On Idea, you get a partner who learns your business and supports your goals.

items.title: Clarity
items.description: We build websites you can understand and manage. Clear choices lead to better results.

items.title: Partnership
items.description: We stay involved after launch. Your success matters to us.

items.title: Honest Communication
items.description: We give clear advice and set realistic expectations. This helps you decide with confidence.

items.title: Quality
items.description: We build reliable, fast websites and follow professional standards in every project.

location.title: Based in Denmark, Serving Europe
location.description: Eye On Idea is based in Aalborg, Denmark. We work with clients across the Nordics and the European Union. Meetings can be online or in person when needed.

cta.title: Let Us Talk About Your Project
cta.description: Whether you have a plan or just an idea, we help you choose the right next step.
